/* package whatever; // don't place package name! */

import java.util.*;
import java.lang.*;
import java.io.*;
import java.math.*;

/* Name of the class has to be "Main" only if the class is public. */
class Ideone
{
	public static int factorial(int n){
		int result = 1;
		for(int i=2;i<=n;i++)
			result*= i;
		return result;
	}
	public static void compPermutation(int n,int r){
		System.out.println(1 - factorial(n)/(factorial(n-r)*factorial(r)));
	}
	public static void main (String[] args) throws java.lang.Exception
	{
		// your code goes here
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		int n = sc.nextInt();
		int m = sc.nextInt();
		int h = sc.nextInt();
		int[] s = new int[m];
		int sum = 0;
		for(int i=0;i<m;i++){
			s[i] = sc.nextInt();
			sum+=s[i];
		}
		compPermutation(sum-s[h-1],n-1);
	}
}
